mapper.select: SELECT prg_no, prg_nm, prg_nope, prg_schdl, prg_nmtm, prg_dow, GET_CD_NM('CO0020', prg_cd) AS prg_cd, GET_CD_NM('CO0010', prg_hr) AS prg_hr, (select c.cns_nm from counselor c where c.cns_no = g.cns_no) AS cns_nm FROM grprograms g WHERE prg_aprv = 1 ORDER BY prg_no DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO grprograms (prg_nm, cns_no, prg_cd, prg_nope, prg_content, prg_schdl, prg_hr, req_end, prg_dow, prg_nmtm, prg_place) VALUES (#{prg_nm}, #{cns_no}, #{prg_cd}, #{prg_nope}, #{prg_content}, #{prg_schdl}, #{prg_hr}, #{req_end}, #{prg_dow}, #{prg_nmtm}, #{prg_place})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM grprograms ORDER BY prg_no DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO grschedule (prg_no, prg_ymd, prg_hr) VALUES (#{prg_no}, #{prg_ymd}, #{prg_hr})
mapper.select: SELECT prg_no FROM grprograms WHERE cns_no = #{cns_no} ORDER BY prg_no DESC LIMIT 1
